name: kinsman (demo)
description:
hellllooooooo, I literally just started this because im bored during the quarentine (rip my spelling) and i was playing a bunch of fire emblem and thought to myself, "hmm this seems pretty easy to make, screw it ill make one" DUDE I HAVE SO MUCH MORE RESEPCT FOR GAME MAKERS THIS CRAP IS HAAAAAAARD, anyway im using SRPG to make this and I plan on keeping this game free, and i will be making regular updates on it as well, please give me all your crticism after you play, it always helps

IMPORTANT

as of now ALL events are on timers so follow the tutorial or the game will break
